node.title: Judge grants Brian Tamaki's bail request
node.description: Hundreds of supporters of Brian Tamaki have gathered near Mt Eden Prison in the expectation he will be released shortly.
node.content:
["Hundreds of supporters of Brian Tamaki have gathered near Mt Eden Prison in the expectation he will be released shortly.", "", "
Brian Tamaki. File photo Photo: RNZ / Marika Khabazi
", "The Destiny Church leader has been in Mount Eden Prison for 10 days after being arrested for breaching bail conditions by speaking at an anti-vaccine rally.", "He was back in court this morning to appeal a judge's decision to remand him in prison.", "This evening, High Court judge Paul Davison has ruled that decision was wrong.", "He has granted Tamaki bail but with a further condition of a 24-hour curfew requiring him to remain at his home.", "The judge has also banned him from having any gathering at his home to encourage people not to comply with Covid-19 regulations.", "Tamaki is due back in court tomorrow to face charges of breaching Covid lockdown restrictions."]
